channel.title: Projects on TS
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on TS

item.title: PAL's Dollhouse
item.description: A client’s side hussle/website I built with Wordpress/WooCommerce and provide ongoing support as needed.

item.title: English/Thai Dictionary
item.description: Created using the Ionic Framework and Sqlite, this dictionary provides autocompleted search as well as the ability to search for entire paragraphs of words at the same time.

item.title: English/Thai Dictionary Crawler
item.description: A one-off crawler used to download the 26.6k words used in the English/Thai dictionary app.

item.title: Thai-Tokenizer
item.description: The hardest part about reading thai sentences is the lack of spaces between words. This tokenizer will break thai sentences down into individual words for easier lookup.

item.title: ML Exploration
item.description: Experimentation with Deep/Machine Learning using Python and Julia.

item.title: Free Code Camp Microservice Projects
item.description: Timestamp Service - Convert Unix timestamps to natural language dates and vice versa. File Size Service - Return the size in bytes of an uploaded file. Header Parser Service - Parse the request header for the IP, Accept Language, and User Agent Image Search Service - Query the google image search api. URL Shortening Service - A service similar to TinyURL or bit.ly for generating short URLs.

item.title: Unity
item.description: Unity is a widely used game engine for building games with C#. The (very basic) prototypes I made include: An Angry Birds style physics game A vertical scrolling space shooter Break Out An imitation of Mike Tyson’s Punch Out
